content: Dopo che l'aveva visto, Ã¨ caduto in una enorme confusione dei pensieri, era divenuto immobile e, in breve, trasformato in pietra.
translations: eng:After having caught sight of her, he fell into a huge confusion of thoughts, was motionless and, in short, turned to sto
